Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships in 'Spider-Man: No Way Home'?
Options:
A. a) Spider-Man is the superhero alter ego of Peter Parker.
B. b) Peter Parker had a relationship with MJ.
C. c) MJ is unaware of Peter Parker's identity as Spider-Man.
D. d) Peter Parker decides against reintroducing himself to MJ.
Correct Answer: a) Spider-Man is the superhero alter ego of Peter Parker. and b) Peter Parker had a relationship with MJ. and d) Peter Parker decides against reintroducing himself to MJ.
